channel.title: _____ cannot log on because server is full
channel.description:
Hey,
After about 25 people join my server disconnects and in the runserver.bat box i get a message saying "username cannot log on because the server is full" and then the server crashes. I would need some help on how to fix this. Doi have to use FTP to run the server or should i use something different than "no-ip.org"? [glow=red,2,300]ANY[/glow] possible solution shall be posted here.
Thanks
Peter

item.title: _____ cannot log on because server is full
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

Hmm i forgot how i fixed mine… There are tuts to change it ok found it…

[code]
public static int EnergyRegian = 60;

public static int MaxConnections = 70;
public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections];
public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections];
public static boolean ShutDown = false;
public static int ShutDownCounter = 0;[/code]

Find that in ur server file in ur source… all the way on the bottom… make ur max connections 70 if its 20… that might help

Read full topic
